definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: For appetizer my wife will have smoked salmon, but I preferashrimp cocktail.
sentences.chinese: 我太太要熏鲑鱼作开胃菜，但是我想要虾子。

sentences.english: Oyster fishermen and the shrimpers that have lived here for ever.
sentences.chinese: 牡蛎农和虾子农，他们在这里居住了一辈子。

sentences.english: It's ox tendon with prawn eggs. It's specialty of this restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 这是虾子蹄筋，是这家饭店的特色菜。

sentences.english: Shrimp in stir fry is my favorite dish.
sentences.chinese: 炒虾子是我对喜欢的菜肴。

sentences.english: You don't know how to eat shrimps with heads and legs attached.
sentences.chinese: 你不知道头和腿没有处理掉的虾子怎么吃。

sentences.english: The otters were rolling in ice cubes, eating shrimp and having a good old time.
sentences.chinese: 海獭们则是在冰块中翻滚，吃虾子，玩得很高兴。

sentences.english: The invention relates to shrimp egg flavor type burdock sauce made from burdock.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及用牛蒡做成的一种虾子香型牛蒡酱。

sentences.english: He brought a ship and tried to shrimp on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他买了一条船并试著在海上捕虾子。

sentences.english: Made with the same ingredients as Shrimp-egg noodles deluxe but with less shrimp roe.
sentences.chinese: 虾子的份量比金方虾子面略少，味道清甜。

sentences.english: Made with the same ingredients as Shrimp-egg noodles deluxe but with less shrimp roe.
sentences.chinese: 虾子的份量比金方虾子面略少，味道清甜。

sentences.english: I'd like some shrimp-roe soy sauce with it.
sentences.chinese: 我希望用虾子酱油蘸着吃。
那些虾子已经剥过壳了。

definition: Asian swamp eel (Monopterus albus)/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
